you cannot be interrupted while preforming this ability
Haste
you move and sprint faster

• +5% damage to melee weapon light attacks \n• +10% mining speed

• +50% stamina damage from melee weapon light and heavy attacks \n• -10% decrease in weight of mined items

• Light and heavy attacks with a melee weapon gain GRIT \n• 25% chance to mine an ore with a single swing
Poison Shot

Shoot a poison arrow that deals {[DamageTable.Bow_PoisonShot.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. On hit or land, this arrow creates 3m radius poison cloud that lasts 6s. Foes entering the cloud are poisoned and take {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison.BaseDuration]}s. This ability cannot headshot.
Infected Arrows

Poison Shot's poison now does {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison_Upgrade.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison.BaseDuration]}s.
Direct Hit
Direct hits against targets are more powerful and now deal {[DamageTable.Bow_PoisonShot_Upgrade.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Evade Shot
Leap back 5m and shoot an arrow dealing {[DamageTable.BowAttackJumpBack.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Evasive Knockback
Evade Shot knocks your target back {[DamageTable.BowAttackKnockBack.ImpactDistanceY]}m.
Go the Distance

Evade Shot grants you a {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Bow_EvasiveShot_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Bow_EvasiveShot_Haste.BaseDuration]}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
Rain of Arrows

Shoot a barrage of arrows that covers a {[SpellDataTable_Bow.Spell_Bow_Spell_RainOfArrows.Radius]}m radius area and deals {[DamageTable.Bow_RainOfArrows_Attack.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. This ability cannot headshot.
Barbed Arrows
Rain of Arrows causes bleed, dealing 85% weapon damage over {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_RainofArrows_Bleed.BaseDuration]}s.
Hooked Arrows

Rain of Arrows causes a {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_RainOfArrows_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_RainOfArrows_Slow.BaseDuration]}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
Evasive Tactics
Deal {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DodgeDmg.DMGStandard * 100]}% more damage for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DodgeDmg.BaseDuration]}s after dodging.
Catch Me If You Can
If surrounded by 3 or more foes within 3m of you, gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteWhenFoesNear.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste. (Haste increases movement speed.)
Closing In
Hitting a foe below 50% health reduces all bow ability cooldowns by {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Skirmish_CDRVsLow.CooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Impale

If you hit a foe with 100% health, inflict a {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_SlowFull.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_SlowFull.BaseDuration]}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
Hunter's Insight
Hitting a foe with a debuff grants {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_StaminaVsDebuff.Stamina]} stamina.
Dodge and Weave

After you dodge, gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DodgeHaste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DodgeHaste.BaseDuration]}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
Archer's Speed

Gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteOnSwap.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteOnSwap.BaseDuration]}s when you swap to your bow. (Haste increases movement speed.) (Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteOnSwap_Timer.BaseDuration]}s.)
Mark
Deal {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DmgVsDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage to foes suffering from a debuff.
Battle Precision
Debuff and damage over time durations last {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DebuffDur.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}% longer.
Knee Shot

Leg shots cause {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Bow_Skirmish.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Bow_Skirmish.BaseDuration]}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
Rapid Shot

Shoot 3 consecutive arrows. The first two deal {[DamageTable.Bow_RapidAttack_Standard.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage each. The last shot causes a knockback and deals {[DamageTable.Bow_RapidAttack_KnockBack.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Rapid Accuracy
If all 3 arrows hit the same target, Rapid Shot’s cooldown is reduced by {[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_RapidAccuracy_CDROnLast.CooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Final Blow
The third arrow of Rapid Shot deals {[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_RapidAccuracy_DmgOnLast.BaseDamage * 100]}% extra damage.
Penetrating Shot
Shoot an arrow that deals {[DamageTable.Bow_Penetrating_Attack.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and passes through targets. This attack has a range of 100m.
Blood Soaked Arrow

Penetrating Shot deals {[DamageTable.Bow_Penetrating_AttackA1.HitRateDmgModifier * 100]}% increased damage after each hit. (Max {[DamageTable.Bow_Penetrating_AttackA1.MaxHitRateDmgMod * 100]}% damage.)
Deep Strike

Penetrating Shot deals {[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_PenetratingShot_DmgPerDist.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage to targets {[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_PenetratingShot_DmgPerDist.DistFromDefender]}m or more away.
Splinter Shot
Shoot an arrow that splits into 3 arrows after traveling 10m. Each arrow deals {[DamageTable.Bow_Spread_Shot.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. This ability cannot headshot.
Scatter Shot
Splinter Shot splits into 5 arrows.
Calculated
Each arrow that hits reduces the cooldown of this ability by {[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_SplinterShot_CDRPerHIt.CooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Long Range
Deal {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsDist.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage to foes at least {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsDist.DistFromDefender]}m away.
Aim True
Heavy attack arrows fly faster and deal {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_HeavyDmg.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage.
Unbreakable Focus
Receive {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Hunter_ArmorAimHeavy.ABSStandard * 100]}% less damage while aiming.
Finishing Shot
Deal {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsLow.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage to targets below 50% health.
Opening Strike
Heavy attacks deal {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgOnFirst.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage to foes with 100% health.
Surprise Attack

Deal {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgOnFirst.BaseDamage * 100]}% extra damage if you haven't damaged a foe in the last {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgOnFirst_Tracker.BaseDuration]}s.
Arrow Range
Increases the distance that arrows travel before being affected by gravity by 100%.
Hawkeye
When you land a headshot, heal yourself for {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_HealOnFive.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% of damage done.
Bullseye
Increases critical chance of bow shots by {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_Crit.CritChance * 100]}%.
Concussion

When you land a headshot, deal {[BowAbilityTable.Ultimate_Bow_Hunter.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage and have a {[BowAbilityTable.Ultimate_Bow_Hunter.RefundAmmoPercentChance * 100]}% chance to get your arrow back.
Charge

Charge 10m and deal {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_Engage1.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage when you reach a target. Press LMB to stop charging and attack early. \n\nThis ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
Frenzied Momentum
Charge now deals {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_Engage1.DmgCoef * 100]} - {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_Engage3.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage based on how far you traveled.
Unpredictable Strike

During Charge you may press RMB to execute a swing attack, dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_Engage_Swing1.DmgCoef * 100]} - {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_Engage_Swing3.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage based on how far you traveled.
Reap

Extend your axe 5m, pulling foes to you and dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_JudgementsReach.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. \n\nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equiped in your great axe, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_JudgementsReach.TauntDuration]}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
The Collector
Reap range is now 8m.
Hunger
Heal yourself for {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greataxe_Reap_Lifesteal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% of damage done by Reap.
Fatal Attraction
After pulling, perform a spin attack dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_JudgementsReach_FA.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Execute

A powerful overhead attack dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_Executioner.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. Deals 300% weapon damage to foes below {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Ability_Greataxe_Executioner.TargetHealthPercent]}% health.
Unstoppable Greed
Execute gains grit during its attack. \n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
Executioner

Execute has a {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greataxe_Executioner_CritVsLowHP.CritChance * 100]}% critical chance against foes below {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greataxe_Executioner_CritVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health.
Greed

Light attacks with your great axe give you a stack of {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_DmgOnLight.DMGStandard * 100]}% damage for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_DmgOnLight.BaseDuration]}s. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_DmgOnLight.StackMax]} stacks.)
Executioner's Speed

Hitting {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_HasteOnLight.NumSuccessfulHits]}+ targets with a great axe light attack grants {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_HasteOnLight.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_HasteOnLight.BaseDuration]}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
Critical Gains
When you critical hit with a great axe, heal yourself for {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_OnCritHeal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% of the damage done.
Death's Embrace

Increase armor penetration of great axe attacks by {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_ArmorPenVsLowHP.ArmorPenetration * 100]}% against foes below {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_ArmorPenVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health.
Frustration

Whenever your attacks are blocked, gain a stack of {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_DmgWhenBlocked.DMGStandard * 100]}% damage for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_DmgWhenBlocked.BaseDuration]}s. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_DmgWhenBlocked.StackMax]} stacks.)
Keen Edge
Critical damage increased by {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_Crit.CritDamage * 100]}%.
Critical Condition

Great axe attacks against foes below {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_CritVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health have {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_CritVsLowHP.CritChance * 100]}% increased critical chance.
Feed

Great axe attacks against foes below {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_HealVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health heal you for {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_HealVsLowHP.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% of damage done.
Blood Lust

You move {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Greataxe_Reaper.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% faster and deal {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Greataxe_Reaper.DMGStandard * 100]}% more damage when looking at a foe within {[SpellDataTable_GreatAxe.Spell_Ultimate_Greataxe_Reaper.Radius]}m.
Whirlwind

Spin and attack all nearby foes, dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_Whirlwind.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. If you hit a foe, spin again. (Max 4 spins.) You can move while spinning. This attack cannot backstab. This attack has Grit. \n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
Gusting Winds
Whirlwind's maximum number of rotations is increased to 7.
Unending Winds
Whirlwind's movement speed is increased by 50%.
Surrounded

If you have {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greataxe_Whirlwind_DmgWhenFoesNear.NumAroundMe]} or more foes around you, deal {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greataxe_Whirlwind_DmgWhenFoesNear.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage.
Maelstrom
Perform a fast, spinning attack that pulls targets closer to you and deals {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_Maelstrom.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Absorb
Consumes all projectiles while Maelstrom is active.
Storm's Reach
Extends Maelstrom's pull range by 50%.
No Reprieve
Maelstrom does an extra spin attack, pulling in foes and dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_Maelstrom_NoReprieve.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Gravity Well

An upward swing dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_GravityWell.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and projecting a powerful tear in reality that creates a vortex. The vortex pulls foes within 10m to its center for 3s. The collapsing vortex ends with a damaging burst dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_GravityWell_Burst.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Unyielding
Allies gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Greataxe_GravityWell_ArmorInWell.ABSStandard * 100]}% Fortify while standing in your well. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.)
Crowded Well
Increase burst damage by {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Upgrade_Greataxe_GravityWell_DmgPerFoe.BaseDamage * 100]}% for each foe caught in the vortex.
Mauler's Resolve

If you get hit while holding a great axe and are below 50% health, gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_StamVsLowHp.Stamina]} stamina. ({[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_StamVsLowHp_Timer.BaseDuration]}s Cooldown.)
Revenge

When you block an attack with a great axe, gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_DmgOnBlock.DMGStandard * 100]}% damage for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_DmgOnBlock.BaseDuration]}s. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_DmgOnBlock.StackMax]} stacks.)
Center of Attention

While holding a great axe, gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_DmgWhenFoesNear.DMGStandard * 100]}% damage when 3 or more foes are within {[SpellDataTable_GreatAxe.Spell_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_DmgWhenFoesNear.Radius]}m.
Crowded Protection

While holding a great axe, gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_ArmorWhenFoesNear.ABSStandard * 100]}% damage absorption when 3 or more foes are within {[SpellDataTable_GreatAxe.Spell_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_ArmorWhenFoesNear.Radius]}m.
Enduring Strike

Adds grit to great axe heavy attacks, and grants {[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_HeavyAddGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}% damage reduction during the heavy attack. \n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
Heavy Pull
Heavy attacks with a great axe pull foes closer to you.
Gravity
After you cause a pull, your foe is rooted for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_GreatAxe_Gravity_Root.BaseDuration]}s.
Mauler's Fury

Great axe attacks grant a stacking {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Greataxe_Mauler.DMGStandard * 100]}% damage increase for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Greataxe_Mauler.DurationMax]}s. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Greataxe_Mauler.StackMax]} stacks.)
Divine Embrace
Heal target for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_DivineEmbrace.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}% weapon damage.\n\nCosts {[ManaCosts_Player.31.ManaCost]} Mana.
Privilege
Divine Embrace costs {[ManaCosts_Player.36.ManaCost]} Mana.
Shared Struggle
If your target is below 50% health, heal one additional ally within 8m for the same amount.
Rebound
If the ally healed by Shared Struggle is below 50% health, heal another ally within 8m of that ally.
Sacred Ground

Create an area on the ground with a 3m radius that lasts for 12s. Allies in the area are healed for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_SacredGround.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}% weapon damage every second.\n\nCosts {[ManaCosts_Player.34.ManaCost]} Mana.
Holy Ground
Regenerate stamina and mana {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_SacredGround_Upgrade.StaminaRate * 100]}% faster while in Sacred Ground.
Blessed
While allies are in Sacred Ground, they are healed for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_SacredGround_Upgrade2.HealMod * 100]}% more from all healing.
Splash of Light

You and all group members within 100m are healed for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_LifeStaff_SplashofLight.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}% weapon damage. \n\nCosts {[ManaCosts_Player.33.ManaCost]} Mana.
Shared Recovery
For each ally healed that is below 50% health, you gain {[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Lifestaff_SplashofLight_ManaOnLow.Mana * 100]}% of your max mana.
Purify
Splash of Light also removes 1 debuff.
Absolved
Life staff's light and heavy attacks no longer consume mana.
Mending Touch
Heavy attacks now remove 1 debuff when passing through an ally.
Blissful Touch
Light attacks now heal for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_HealOnLight.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}% weapon damage when passing through an ally.
Revitalize
When you hit with a light attack, reduce life staff ability cooldowns by {[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_CDROnLight.CooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Desperate Speed

When you heal an ally below 50% health, life staff ability cooldowns are reduced by {[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_CDROnLow.CooldownTimer * -100]}%. (Can only be triggered once every {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_CDROnLow_Timer.BaseDuration]}s.)
Enchanted Justice

When hit in battle, activate a healing aura for you and nearby friends in a 4m radius. The aura heals for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_AoeHealWhenHit.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}% weapon damage each second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_AoeHealWhenHit.BaseDuration]}s. (Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_AoeHealWhenHit_Timer.BaseDuration]}s.)
Sacred Protection
While holding a life staff, increase the amount of incoming healing to all friendlies in your group by {[Type_StatusEffectData.LifeStaff_IncreasedHealing_Passive.HealMod * 100]}%
Intensify

When you hit with a heavy attack, gain a stacking {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_HealingBuffonBasic.HealScalingValueMultiplier * 100]}% bonus to healing effectiveness for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_HealingBuffonBasic.BaseDuration]}s. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_HealingBuffonBasic.StackMax]} stacks.)
Divine Blessing
When you heal an ally below 50% health, they are healed for {[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Ultimate_Lifestaff_Healing.HealScalingValueMultiplier * 100]}% more.
Orb of Protection

Shoot out a light projectile that grants {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.ABSStandard * 100]}% fortify for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]}s, heals an ally for 10% of weapon damage, and deals {[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage when it hits an enemy. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.) \n\nCosts {[ManaCosts_Player.69.ManaCost]} Mana.
Protector's Blessing

If Orb of Protection hits an ally, they gain recovery for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection_HealoverTime.BaseDuration]}s. (Recovery heals for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection_HealoverTime.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}% weapon damage every second.)
Shared Protection
If you successfully heal an ally with Orb of Protection, you also gain fortify and recovery.
Aegis
When this projectile hits, it effects all allies within a 3m radius.
Light's Embrace

Heal target for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_LightsEmbrace.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}% weapon damage +{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Ability_Lifestaff_LightsEmbrace.HealScalingValueMultiplier * 100]}% more for each buff on that target. \n\nCosts {[ManaCosts_Player.68.ManaCost]} Mana.
Inspire
When you heal a target with Light's Embrace, that target gains {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_GiveStam.Stamina]} stamina.
Connection
When you heal a target with Lights Embrace, gain {[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_ManaPerBuff.Mana * 100]}% of your max mana for each buff your target has.
Magnify
When you heal a target with Light's Embrace, extend the duration of life staff buffs on that target by {[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Ultimate_Lifestaff_Protection.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s.
Beacon

A powerful ground strike that erupts a linear wave of energy in front of the player, dealing {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_PathOfDestiny.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage to all targets in its path.
Seismic Waves
Path of Destiny now staggers all targets in its path.
Stimulated Reduction
Ability cooldown reduced by {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_PathOfDestiny_CDRPerHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}% for each enemy hit with Path of Destiny.
Outnumbered

Increase damage absorption by {[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_ArmorNearbyEnemy.ABSStandard * 100]}% if surrounded by 2 or more enemies within {[SpellDataTable_WarHammer.WarHammer_ArmorPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]}m.
I Can Do This All Day
Reduce stamina consumption by {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_LessStaminaOnBlock.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}% when blocking melee attacks.
Guarded Sprint
Reduce damage taken by {[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Pass_SprintDmgReduction.ABSThrust * 100]}% while sprinting.
Acceleration
Reduce war hammer cooldowns by {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_CDROnDebuffHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}% when using light attacks against targets with an active debuff.
Facilitated Expedition

After hitting a target with an active debuff, gain haste, increasing movement speed by {[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Pass_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Pass_Haste.BaseDuration]}s.
Concussive Impact
Deal {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_DmgToWHDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage against targets affected by war hammer debuffs.
Prevailing Spirit
Regain {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% of damage dealt as health when using a Crowd Crusher ability.
Resurgence
After 2 light attacks with the war hammer, debuff durations on player are reduced by 25%. (Cooldown 5s.)
Perforate

Execute 3 quick piercing strikes that each deal {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Perforate.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and apply rend, reducing the target's damage absorption by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_Rend.ABSThrust * -100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_Rend.BaseDuration]}s.
Impactful Strikes
Target is staggered if you successfully land all 3 hits.
Rupturing Strikes

Rend increased to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Perforate_Rend_Upgrade.ABSThrust * -100]}% per strike against targets above {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_Perforate_BonusRend.TargetHealthPercent]}% health.
Javelin
Throw your spear, dealing {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Javelin.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and staggering on hit.
Forceful Impact
Targets are knocked down on hit.
Deadly Distance
Javelin deals 2.5% bonus damage per meter traveled. (Max 100%.)
Refreshing Precision
Headshots reduce Javelin cooldown by {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_Javelin_CDROnHeadshot.cooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Cyclone

Spin attack that deals {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Cyclone.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage, pushes targets back {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Cyclone.ImpactDistanceY]}m and applies {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Cyclone_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Cyclone_Slow.BaseDuration]}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
Invigorating Combo
Restore {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Cyclone_BonusStaminaOnMultiHit.Stamina]} stamina per target hit.
Strong Momentum
Grit is now active during the attack.\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
Refreshing Reach
Successful heavy attacks reduce all spear cooldowns by {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_CDROnHvyHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Deadly Reach
Critical chance is increased by {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusCritChanceAtRng.CritChance * 100]}% when attacking targets that are at least 3m away.
Precise Jabs
Light attacks have a {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusCritChanceOnLight.CritChance * 100]}% increased critical chance.
Invigorating Crits
Restore {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_BonusStaminaOnCrit.Stamina]} stamina on critical hits.
Deadly Consistency

Deal {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusHvyDmgConsec.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage on consecutive heavy attacks against a single target. Stacks up to {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusHvyDmgConsec.MaxConsecutiveHits]} times.
Evasive Maneuvers
Dodging backwards consumes 20% less stamina for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_ReducedDodgeStamCost.BaseDuration]}s after a successful hit.
Defensive Stance

Gain fortify after successful heavy attacks, increasing damage absorption by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_FortifyOnHvyHit.ABSThrust * 100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_FortifyOnHvyHit.BaseDuration]}s.
Strong Conditioning
Stamina regeneration rate is increased by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_BonusStamRegenOnLowStam.StaminaRate * 100]}% when your stamina is below 50%.
Reserved Strength
Deal {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgMaxStamina.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage while stamina is full.
Skewer

Rush forward and skewer your target, dealing {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Skewer_Stab.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and applying bleed. Bleed deals {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_Bleed.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage every {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_Bleed.TickRate]}s for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_Bleed.BaseDuration]}s.
Deep Wound
Bleed duration increased to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_Bleed_Upgrade.BaseDuration]}s.
Deadly Ambush
Skewer deals {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_Skewer_BonusDmgVsMaxHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage against targets that have full health.
Follow Through

Gain empower if Skewer critical hits, increasing damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_EmpowerOnCrit.DMGThrust * 100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_Skewer_EmpowerOnCrit.BaseDuration]}s.
Sweep
Sweep the target's legs, dealing {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Sweep.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and knocking them down.
Tenacious Sweep
Grit is now active during the attack.\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
Coup de Grâce
Press Basic Attack during Sweep to follow up with a heavy stab that deals {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_Sweep_Finish.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Vault Kick

Use your spear to vault forward and kick your target, dealing {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_VaultKick.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. Applies stun for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_VaultKick_Stun.BaseDuration]}s. \n\nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your spear, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.2H_Spear_VaultKick.TauntDuration]}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
Relentless Blows

Gain empower after successful hits on targets below {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_VaultKick_EmpowerVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health, increasing damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_VaultKick_EmpowerVsLowHP.DMGThrust * 100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_VaultKick_EmpowerVsLowHP.BaseDuration]}s.
Continuous Motion
Cooldowns for other spear abilities are reduced by {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_VaultKick_CDROnHit.cooldownTimer * -100]}% on successful hit.
Refreshing Jabs
All spear ability cooldowns are reduced by {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_CDROnLight.cooldownTimer * -100]}% on the second hit of the light attack chain.
Crippling Jabs

The last hit of the light attack chain applies {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_SlowOnLightVsLowHP.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_SlowOnLightVsLowHP.BaseDuration]}s to targets below {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_SlowOnLightVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
Unerring Precision
Deal {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsGrit.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage against targets with active grit.
Merciless Strength
Deal {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsKnockedDown.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage against knocked down targets.
Finishing Blows

Deal {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage against targets with less than {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% health.
Aggressive Maneuvers

The first successful hit with an ability within {[Type_StatusEffectData.Spear_CDROnHitAfterDodge.BaseDuration]}s of dodging reduces all spear cooldowns by {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_CDROnHitAfterDodge.CooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Exacerbating Crits
Critical hits extend the duration of your spear debuffs and damage over time effects by {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_ExtendDebuffOnCrit.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%.
Exposed Wounds
Critical chance is increased by {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusCritChanceVsBleed.CritChance * 100]}% when attacking a bleeding target.
Exploited Weakness
Deal {[SpearAbilityTable.Ability_Spear_BonusDmgVsDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}% bonus damage for each debuff on your target. (Max 30%.)
Tondo

Slash so quickly that it extends the reach of your blade up to 5m. This strike deals {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Slash.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and applies a bleed that will deal and additional 85% weapon damage over {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Bleed_DOT.BaseDuration]}s. This bleed can stack up to 3 times, refreshing previous applications.
Thirst For Blood
When applying the first bleed stack to an opponent, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Slash_Mod1.cooldownTimer * -100]}%.
And Again
If you hit only one target, even on a blocked hit, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Slash_Mod2.cooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Proper Spacing

Increases initial hit damage from Tondo by {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Slash_Mod3.BaseDamage * 100]}% if you are at least {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Slash_Mod3.DistFromDefender]}m away from your target.
Flurry

Enter a posed stance and unleash a series of five quick thrust attacks with each strike dealing more weapon damage starting at {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Flurry_Strike_1.DmgCoef * 100]}% and ending at {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Flurry_Strike_5.DmgCoef * 100]}%. Flurry can be canceled by dodging.
Fleeting Strikes
Each hit of Flurry reduces its cooldown by 7%.
Overwhelm
Each hit of Flurry does {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Flurry_All_In.BlockDamage * 100]}% more block damage.
To the Bone

Each hit of Flurry extends the rapier's bleed by {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Flurry_Weakness.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s. Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.
Finalize
The last hit of Flurry will cause the enemy to stagger.
Flourish and Finish

Flourish performs an attack dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Flourish.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and knocking back enemies. Pressing light attack at the end of Flourish will perform the followup attack, Finish. Finish lunges forward dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Finish.DmgCoef * 100]}% direct weapon damage and consumes all rapier bleeds on any target hit dealing {[RapierAbilityTable.Ability_Rapier_Flourish.ConsumeTargetStatusEffectMult * 100]}% of their damage immediately.
With Flair
Gain grit on both Flourish and Finish. \n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
Swagger
Gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Finish_Stam_Mod2.Stamina]} stamina when successfully hitting a target with Finish.
Fuel
Each tick of damage from Tondo's bleed reduces the cooldown of this ability by {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Flourish_Mod3.cooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Bloody End

Finish deals {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Flourish_Mod4.ConsumeTargetStatusEffectMult * 100]}% of the rapier's bleed damage instead of only {[RapierAbilityTable.Ability_Rapier_Flourish.ConsumeTargetStatusEffectMult * 100]}%.
Riposte

Enter into a defensive stance for 1s. If struck during this ability, counter the attacker dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Riposte_Stun.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and stunning them briefly for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Riposte_Stun.BaseDuration]}s. You are briefly invulnerable upon a successful Riposte. \n\nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your rapier, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Riposte_Taunt.TauntDuration]}s to all foes within 5m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
Insult to Injury
If the Riposte is triggered successfully, all of your attacks become uninterruptible for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Riposte_Uninterruptible.BaseDuration]}s.
Priority
Reduce the cooldown of other rapier abilities by {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Riposte_Mod2.cooldownTimer * -100]}% when landing a Riposte stun.
Lasting Consequence
Increase the stun from Riposte to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Riposte_Stun_Enhanced.BaseDuration]}s.
Fleche
Leave the ground lunging forward for 10m in a stabbing motion and pierce through enemies dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Aerial_Lunge.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Quick Lunge
Killing with this ability reduces its cooldown by {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Aerial_Lunge_Mod1.cooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Backside

After performing Fleche, your next critical strike within {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Fleche_Backstab.BaseDuration]}s will deal {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Aerial_Lunge_Mod2.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage.
Interruption
Pressing light attack any time during Fleche will stop and perform a static, continuation attack dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Wake.DmgCoef * 100]}% damage.
Evade

Perform a small, reliable sidestep in your current movement direction that cancels any current activity and provides momentary invulnerability. Light attacks made during Evade are performed exceptionally fast.
Breathe In
Gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Evasion_Mod1.Stamina]} stamina immediately on use.
Allegro
Gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Evasion_Mod2.MoveSpeedMod* 100]}% haste for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Evasion_Mod2.BaseDuration]}s on use. (Haste increases movement speed.)
Adagio

Evading forward gains {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Evasion_Mod3.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage on your next light attack. Ends on hit or after {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Evade_Forward_Damage.BaseDuration]}s.
Crescendo
Individual successful light attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Evasion_Mod4.cooldownTimer * -100]}% each.
Refreshing Strikes
Reduce all rapier cooldowns by {[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier02.cooldownTimer * -100]}% on any hit.
Heavy Puncture

Any heavy attack on a bleeding enemy will extend their rapier bleeds by {[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier03.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]} seconds. Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.
Engarde
Deal {[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier05.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage when your target has greater than {[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier05.TargetHealthPercent]}% health.
Unerring
Deal {[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier04.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage to targets with a rapier bleed.
Light Edge
Increase damage from both middle swipe attacks in the light attack chain by {[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier01.BaseDamage * 100]}%.
Perfectionist
Deal {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusDMGMaxHP.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage when your health is full.
Red Curtains
Critical strikes reduce all cooldowns by {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusCDOnCrit.cooldownTimer * -100]}%.
Controlled Breathing
Gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusStamOnHit.Stamina]} stamina on any hit.
Swiftness

Gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusSpeedOnKill.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusSpeedOnKill.BaseDuration]}s on rapier hits. Can stack up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusSpeedOnKill.StackMax]} times. (Haste increases movement speed.)
Desperation
Deal {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusDmgLowStamina.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage when your stamina is below {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusDmgLowStamina.MyStaminaPercent]}%.
Momentum

Deal {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusDMGAfterAbility.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage on your next light or heavy attack after performing an ability. Ends on hit or after {[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusDMGAfterAbility.BaseDuration]}s.
Ice Spikes

Creates a trail of spikes that start from the player and go out in a straight line for 8m dealing {[DamageTable.IceMagic_Spikes.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. The final spike is a Mighty Spike that will deal {[DamageTable.IceMagic_Spikes_End.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and apply pushback. Pressing light attack before the path fully forms will spawn the Mighty Spike early.\n\nCost 15 Mana.
Refreshing Spikes
Cooldown for this ability reduced by 10% if an enemy is hit by the Mighty Spike.
Empowered Spikes
Mighty Spike damage increased by 20% when hitting an enemy below 30% health.
Deadly Path
Increases damage by 10% and adds stagger to the path of spikes. Does not increase Mighty Spike damage.
Spiky Reach
Ice shards fire from the sides of the Mighty Spike to hit a wider area. Each shard has a 6m range and deals {[DamageTable.IceMagic_Spike_Reach.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Ice Storm

Create a 5m radius storm at the target area that deals {[DamageTable.IceMagic_IceStorm.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage every 0.33s for 5s. The storm also creates a frosted area that slows enemies in it by 25%. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)\n\nCost 25 Mana.
Weakening Gust
Incoming damage is increased by 10% for 3s to enemies in Ice Storm while they are below 50% health.
Storm Summoner
Ice Storm mana cost is decreased by 80% while at full mana.
Punishing Storm
Increases damage by 10% for each enemy in Ice Storm.
Wind Chill

Blasts a column of freezing winds forward that pushes back enemies 5m and deals {[DamageTable.IceMagic_WindChill.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage each hit. Wind Chill has a total range of 7m with the farthest 2m increasing damage 20% without pushing enemies.
Player is able to move during the attack.

Cost 20 Mana.
Enduring Chill
Increase duration of Wind Chill by 1s.
Chilling Blast
Increase the damage of the last 2m of the Wind Chill range by 25%.
Cold Reach
Increase damage of light and heavy attacks by 15% for targets farther than 15m.
Critical Rejuvenation
Gain 15 mana whenever you critically hit a target.
Energized Critical
Increase critical damage of ice gauntlet abilities by {[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass3.CritDamage * 100]}% while stamina is full.
Gathering Storm
Gain 15 mana whenever you hit with 3 consecutive light attacks.
Critical Frost
Increase critical chance by {[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass5.CritChance * 100]}% when hitting an enemy in a frosted area or when hitting an enemy with frostbite.
Heavy Freeze
Heavy attacks will root a target if they standing in Ice Storm or have frostbite. Root lasts for 1 second and has a 5 second cooldown.
Ultimate Chill
Ice gauntlet abilities chill targets, increasing ice damage dealt to the target by {[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_UltimateChill.WKNIce * 100]}% for 3s.
Ice Pylon

Place a pylon that fires ice projectiles at enemies within 20m. Projectiles deal {[DamageTable.IceMagic_Pylon.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage if they hit. Ice Pylon creates a 1m radius frosted area around itself and lasts for 15s unless it is destroyed.\n\nCost 15 Mana.
Greater Pylon
Increases damage of Ice Pylon by 10% against slowed targets.
Pylon Regen
Ice Pylon regenerates to full health 5s after last damage taken.
Pylon Dodge
Dodging with full stamina increases Ice Pylon rate of fire for 3s.
Pylon Refresh
A successful hit from the Ice Pylon extends its lifetime by 1s. (Maximum 45s.)
Ice Shower

Summon a shower of ice that creates a frosted area approximately 1m by 5m that lasts for 4s. Enemies that enter the Ice Shower will be stricken with a powerful frostbite. Frostbite roots for 1s, blocks sprinting and dodging, slows movement speed by 50%, and will remain on target for 3s after exiting the Ice Shower.\n\nCost 25 Mana.
Enduring Shower
Increase Ice Shower duration to 7s.
Quick Shower
Any ally, including self, will get a 25% movement speed boost for 2s when entering Ice Shower.
Frigid Showers
Frostbite applies rend to target, reducing their defense by 10%.
Entombed

Entomb yourself in ice to become invulnerable and greatly increase mana regeneration. The tomb lasts for 10s but can be destroyed early. Press block to exit the tomb normally or press light attack to exit while causing a damaging knockback at the cost of 20 mana.\n\nCost 0 Mana.
Strengthened Tomb
Increase defense by 25% for 3s after breaking out of Entombed.
Cleansing Tomb
Cleanse all debuffs when Entombed activates.
Blocking Stamina
Blocking an attack with the ice gauntlet will convert mana to stamina. Converts 3 mana to 15 stamina.
Quick Frost
Increase movement speed by 10% in a frosted area.
Empowered Frost
Gain 3 mana for each spell cast while in a frosted area.
Frozen Touch
Slow enemies by 25% for 2s when they hit you with a melee attack while you have 100% health. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
Refreshing Frost
Reduce the cooldown of all ice gauntlet abilities by 20% when casting an ability in a frosted area.
Defiant Freeze
Casting an ice gauntlet ability creates an ice hardened layer, granting 20% fortify for 2s. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.)
Ultimate Frost
Doubles Ice Pylon's health and extends Ice Pylon's frosted area radius to 5m. Standing in this frosted area doubles Quick Frost and Empowered Frost bonuses.
